PassiveDesc.Name: Woof ruff! Doodly-doo? Heehaw~!
PassiveDesc.Desc: On a successful Blunt attack, deal 1-2 bonus Stagger damage.

PassiveDesc.Name: Triarchy
PassiveDesc.Desc: The first three Speed dice use Combat Pages that belong to specific heads.

PassiveDesc.Name: Uncontrollable Performance
PassiveDesc.Desc: Cannot be Staggered. Starting with the second Scene, performs the following action every 3 Scenes: uses a Mass Attack page, then all resistances change to "Fatal" on the following Scene.

PassiveDesc.Name: Shimmering
PassiveDesc.Desc: At the start of each Scene, exhaust all pages in hand and deck; add new pages to hand. Their Cost becomes 0.

PassiveDesc.Name: From the Top
PassiveDesc.Desc: Every Scene, one head becomes active. Each head uses different Combat Pages. On certain Scenes, uses special Combat Pages that inflict the target with 'Tagged', a status effect that allows them to gain a copy of a Combat Page after winning a clash against it.

PassiveDesc.Name: Busted Chops
PassiveDesc.Desc: When Staggered, the Speed die that belongs to the currently active head will break, and the character will recover from Stagger next Scene. When all heads are destroyed, the battle progresses to the next phase.

PassiveDesc.Name: Martial Song of the Battlefield
PassiveDesc.Desc: While this character is alive, give an ally a random positive status effect. (Strength, Endurance, or Haste) The amount given equals the amount of Light this character has.

PassiveDesc.Name: Erlöschend Dirge of a War Grave
PassiveDesc.Desc: Upon death: all enemies gain 3 Strength, Endurance, and Haste next scene.
